name: 0xB10C
cooked: I’ve opened [no-merge] what's the diff to a fresh run by 0xB10C · Pull Request #1 · jamesob/delving-bitcoin-archive · GitHub to check how big the diff of GitHub - jamesob/delving-bitcoin-archive: A public archive of delvingbitcoin.org to a fresh archival would be. Some diff is expected (e.g. number of likes, JSON fields only added in newer discourse versions, …), but I also noticed some posts and topics that were never archived.
